ygData.subject: Into the Darkness
ygData.msgSnippet: Images! Pain! Lights! Pain! Darkness! Pain! These were the things that assaulted Rodimus as he somehow moved down a tunnel that seemed to be composed of stone

Images! Pain! Lights! Pain! Darkness! Pain!

These were the things that ass=
aulted Rodimus as he somehow moved down a tunnel that seemed to be composed=
 of stone and heat and flames! He opened his eyes, not even having been awa=
re of closing them and looked around. he could barely make out the reddish =
sheen that the faintly glowing magma left along the walls and ceiling. The =
heat was barely tolerable and almost unbearable. 

He looked down at his ha=
nds and shuddered as he saw only the blackness of Dark Rodimus, it took him=
 a full moment that his armor was black, not because of evil, but because i=
t was so badly scorched and burnt that all the other colors had been lost.
=

He smiled for a moment, feeling a curious sense of freedom. He felt free o=
f the darkness that had overwhelmed him, the fear and guilt he had lived wi=
th for so many months. He felt new and alive! He felt a sense of giddiness =
as he flexed his fingers and he began to laugh  . . . 

Two luminous eyes a=
ppeared out of the darkness and blinked, "Yesss, you lie still now." a voic=
e hissed from nearby. "We will get you back to the machine, yess we will." =


Rodimus' laughter was cut short as he realized that he was being carried =
by something, something large and misshapen, yet it moved amazingly quick! =


It was then that Rodimus heard a strange piercing scream from somewhere i=
n the darkness. It took him a moment to realize that it was he that was the=
 one screaming as he saw and felt large all around him! 

He felt a sting o=
n his shoulder, and for a second he was surprised that he could feel such a=
 tiny sensation and then his world went dark.

(TAG or TBC)

Preston
